metadata.name: Free Downloads
metadata.description: Displays all tracks who's price is set to 0.00 in your music store.

param.name: display_num
param.label: Tracks Per Page
param.description: Number of Tracks to display on the page.

param.name: orderBy
param.label: Order Tracks By
param.description: Order in which to display albums.

param.name: email
param.label: Require Email Address Before Download?
param.description: If checked downloads will only be administred when the users supplies an email address

param.name: accept_users
param.label: Allow Users To Download?
param.description: If selected registered users can download tracks without supplying an email address.

param.name: color
param.label: Alternate Row Color
param.description: Will dispalay alternate row color. If you don't want a color enter the word 'none'

param.name: system
param.label: Select Newsletter System
param.description: Which system to populate if emails are required for downloads.
